pageContext.claim: “John Kerry had illegal meetings with the very hostile Iranian Regime, which can only serve to undercut our great work to the detriment of the American people. He told them to wait out the Trump Administration! Was he registered under the Foreign Agents Registration Act? BAD!”
pageContext.analysis: Meetings between a private U.S. citizen and a foreign official are not necessarily against the law. A specialist in foreign lobbying told the Post that we don't yet know enough about Kerry's meeting to determine if it was "illegal" or if he should have registered under FARA.
